rules:
BY PLAYING ON THIS SERVER YOU AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING RULES;
1) NO MODS/CHEATS/HACKS We do not tollerate any mods/cheats/hacks of any kind. If you are caught cheating, you will be banned.
2) ALWAYS LISTEN TO ADMINS If you fail to comply with an admins orders, you may be kicked or banned.
3) NEVER USE [SANL] TAG The SANL clan is private, and only to be worn by members of the clan. If you are caught with the tag on you will be banned.
4) DON'T SPAM CHAT Don't consistantly spam the chatbox or you will be banned.
